```{r}
brains <-read.table("~/Google Drive/HCP/HCP_graph/1200/datasets/tmp/IC2gordon.csv", sep=",", header=F)
head(brains)
```



```{r}
z_brains<-apply(brains[1:100], MARGIN = 2, scale)
describe(z_brains)
z_brains<-as.data.frame(z_brains)
z_brains <- cbind(z_brains, name = brains$V101)
head(z_brains)
```

```{r}
getting_names <- function(x) {
  name = z_brains$name[[which.max(x)]]
  return(name)
}

```



```{r}
names<-as.data.frame(apply(z_brains[1:100], 2, getting_names))
head(names)
names$IC<- rownames(names)
colnames(names)[colnames(names) == 'apply(z_brains[1:100], 2, getting_names)'] <- 'Gordon Label'
```
```{r}
write.table(names, "~/Google Drive/HCP/HCP_graph/1200/datasets/tmp/parcel_names.csv", row.names = F, sep = ",")
```
